name: api_api_auto_cpanel_login
description:
Logs into cpanel for the given website id and returns a unique logged-in url. 
* The status will be "ok" if successful, or "error" if there was any problems
* status_text will contain a description of the problem if any.

function.name: api_api_auto_cpanel_login
function.desc: Logs into cpanel for the given website id and returns a unique logged-in url.  The status will be "ok" if successful, or "error" if there was any problems status_text will contain a description of the problem if any.

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param id int id of website
